definitions.meng2: drizzle; mist; blind; dim-sighted; to cover; ignorant; to suffer (misfortune); to receive (a favor); to cheat;
definitions.meng1: to deceive; to cheat; to hoodwink; to make a wild guess; (knocked) unconscious; dazed; stunned;
definitions.Meng3: Mongol ethnic group; abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]; Taiwan pr. [Meng2];
